37.eng-name: The Book of Fighting [The Prohibition of Bloodshed]

hadiths.text: It was narrated from An-Nu'man bin Salim that:A man said to him: "The Messenger of Allah [SAW] came to us while we were in a tent inside the Masjid of Al-Al-Madinah, and he said to us: 'It has been revealed to me that I should fight the people until they say La ilaha illallah.'" A similar narration
